description: A helper that simplifies creating and testing Symcon modules.
command.createLibraryTitle: Create new module library project (via Wizard)
config.emptyValuesDesc: If activated, fields with empty values are also transferred to the form.
config.deleteDefaultsDesc: If activated, fields with default values are not transferred to the form.
config.defaultWidthDesc: If not empty, the default width is overwritten with the stored value (px or %).
config.alwaysIncludesDesc: List of parameter keys that should always be written, even if empty or default (comma-separated).
config.serverIPDesc: IP address under which the tile visualisation runs.
config.serverPortDesc: Port under which the server delivers the tile visualisation.
config.themesDesc: Themes configuration (line-based). Use: theme-name: bg-color, accent-color, card-color, content-color.
config.projectTemplateDesc: Directory of library and module templates.
config.projectCopyDesc: Copy additional files and directories from the template directory (separated by commas).
config.projectStylesDesc: URL of the code style repository.
config.projectStubsDesc: URL of the symcon stubs repository (if empty, the environment variable IPS_STUBS_PATH is used).
config.generalAuthorDesc: Name of the author or developer.
config.generalBuildDesc: Pattern for the build number. Placeholders: %Y=year, %m=month, %d=day, %H=hour, %M=minute, %S=second, %t=Unix timestamp, %V=major version, %v=minor version.
